Articles.Content:
I just discovered this game called SimpleRockets for most smartphones (at least on Android and Windows Phone, not sure about ios) You may already have heard of it.

As a person spending a lot of time playing KSP I find it very enjoyable being able to build rockets. First time I ever spent money on an app and I feel it was worth it.

Discussion. Post your creations, if you like.
It's on iOS as well. I play it sometimes when i'm waiting in public.
It's good but it's very limiting since to make a rocket bigger you usually need to go wide, and there are no struts...

There is one strut. It's pretty big though.

A mod containing all the parts for KSP would be something awesome.
